meta.description: Optimize daily nutritional intake to meet requirements at minimum cost using available food items.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Available food items at the supermarket.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams for each food item.

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrate content in grams for each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Caloric content for each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food item to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 78 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbs[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 140 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1537 calories are consumed.
